title: How It Works
subtitle: Our seamless process ensures secure, efficient prescription management for everyone involved

patients.title: Create Account
patients.description: Sign up with your personal information and connect with your healthcare providers.

patients.title: Receive Notifications
patients.description: Get instant alerts when your doctor issues a new prescription.

patients.title: Access Prescriptions
patients.description: View all your prescriptions securely through the TrustMeds mobile app or web portal.

patients.title: Send to Pharmacy
patients.description: Choose your preferred pharmacy and send your prescription with one click.

patients.title: Stay Updated
patients.description: Receive status updates and communicate with your pharmacy about your medication.

patients.title: Manage Refills
patients.description: Request prescription renewals and set up reminders for medication refills.

doctors.title: Secure Login
doctors.description: Access the TrustMeds platform using multi-factor authentication.

doctors.title: Create Prescription
doctors.description: Generate digital prescriptions with comprehensive medication details.

doctors.title: Digital Signature
doctors.description: Authenticate prescriptions with your secure digital signature and encryption.

doctors.title: Transmit Securely
doctors.description: Send the prescription directly to the patient's TrustMeds account.

doctors.title: Manage Records
doctors.description: Track prescription history and monitor patient medication compliance.

doctors.title: Patient Communication
doctors.description: Securely message patients about their prescriptions and answer questions.

pharmacists.title: Receive Orders
pharmacists.description: Get immediate notifications when new prescriptions are sent to your pharmacy.

pharmacists.title: Verify Authenticity
pharmacists.description: Confirm prescription validity through blockchain verification and doctor credentials.

pharmacists.title: Process Prescription
pharmacists.description: Review medication details and check for potential drug interactions.

pharmacists.title: Prepare Medication
pharmacists.description: Fill the prescription and prepare it for pickup or delivery.

pharmacists.title: Patient Communication
pharmacists.description: Send notifications about prescription status and answer medication questions.

pharmacists.title: Update Records
pharmacists.description: Maintain complete digital records of all dispensed medications.
